function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in calls to helpline for violence against women in Peru after stay-at-home policies started","Impact":"48 percent increase in violence against women since the pandemic, with effects increasing over time","Mitigation":"Identify and implement policies to mitigate unintended effects of stay-at-home orders, such as cash transfers to reduce intimate partner violence","Technologies":"Cash transfer programs","People":"Women in Peru","Owner":"Policymakers, government, and organizations working on women's rights"},{"Description":"Rise in domestic violence in Peru where almost 60 percent of women experienced violence before the virus arrived","Impact":"Exacerbates existing high levels of violence against women in Peru","Mitigation":"Implementation of policies and programs to address and prevent domestic violence, targeted support for at-risk individuals","Technologies":"Social support programs, educational campaigns, and community outreach","People":"Women in Peru, especially those at risk of domestic violence","Owner":"Government, NGOs, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Unintended effects of stay at home orders leading to increased domestic violence globally","Impact":"Negative impact on the safety and well-being of individuals, particularly women, due to enforced isolation and economic strain","Mitigation":"Development and implementation of support systems, financial assistance, and community interventions to address and prevent domestic violence","Technologies":"Digital support platforms, financial aid programs, and community engagement tools","People":"Women and at-risk individuals globally","Owner":"International organizations, governments, and community support networks"}]}
